duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage cash flow, investment, and asset management.
Maintain internal controls, financial procedures, and strategies.
Generate timely, accurate monthly grant billing to all public and private grant funders.
Develop and execute analysis of business initiatives using predictive modeling and activity-based financial analyses.
Engage the board, executive and finance/audit committees around issues, trends, and changes in operating model(s) and operational delivery.
Make strategic recommendations within funding restrictions related to grants and program funding sources.

Responsible for month-end, quarter-end and year-end closing activities including, but not limited to, general ledger maintenance, journal entries, balance sheet reconciliations, cost allocation, and financial statements.

education_certification.credential: BS in Accounting, Finance or related field; CPA designation preferred
